channel.title: [HELP]RevolutionX
channel.description:
Hello, i am trying to use RevolutionX i got the source but the client is not loading i got the client and cache
but when i try a dif client it work but when i stay in game about 1min it freeze help
When i use RevolutionX Client it dont let me log it all it does it say connection error - Retrying in

item.title: [HELP]RevolutionX
item.dc:creator: @markdabest33 markdabest33
item.description:
@markdabest33 wrote:

for the real client the 1 you downloaded with the source u need to delete the cache and let it download it again.

after that if it dosnt work then use another client…
